column1: I ran for Senate because I was sick and tired of watching the Senate GOP fight to make life harder for working people.  COVID-19 has shown how important it is for every family to have high-quality affordable health care. When I'm in the Senate that will be my priority on Day 1.

As COVID-19 cases rise we all must work to keep our communities safe.  I'm glad to have secured more than $15.5 million to fund PPE and critical medical supplies & increase medical staffing. As this pandemic continues I'll keep fighting for the federal COVID-19 relief we need. https://t.co/5FKdVWgN3N

Glad to see that New Mexico has been chosen as one of 4 states for a #COVID19 vaccine pilot.  This pilot will help NM prepare to deliver vaccines quickly and efficiently to families across our state & begin the path to rebuild and recover from the virus. https://t.co/XBfeL16j6p

President Trump's COVID-19 response left families struggling and our economy shattered.  His health care plan would end protections for pre-existing conditions and make insurance unaffordable during a pandemic.  But no matter what Trump does he still has @MarkRonchettiNM's vote.

Today we marked 1000 New Mexicans lost to COVID-19.   My heart is aching for all the families represented in this tragic milestone. Please wear a mask and practice social distancing — we’re all in this together https://t.co/ipN6PsDhKo

I know our communities are worth fighting for.  That’s why I’ve worked to deliver on what matters — from lower drug costs to COVID-19 relief. As your senator I’ll keep fighting until every New Mexican gets back on their feet. https://t.co/8r9ziu5Wkz

Missed last week's debate on @NMPBS?  Watch online to hear about my plans to strengthen our health care system create new jobs and opportunities for New Mexican families and lead our recovery from COVID-19.  https://t.co/6BdQa3EkAD

When frontline heroes like Valerie need help I'll always have their backs.  In the Senate I’ll keep working every day to make sure our doctors and nurses have the personal protective equipment and support they need to beat COVID-19. In New Mexico we're in this together. https://t.co/nBYwS3bHvz

When #COVID19 hit New Mexico I fought to secure funding for our small businesses and frontline workers.  @MarkRonchettiNM sat on the sidelines and said that New Mexico didn’t need a bailout. #nmpol #nmsendebate
Even as New Mexico faces one of the most dangerous #COVID19 spikes in the nation @MarkRonchettiNM still isn't taking this pandemic seriously. #nmpol #NMSenDebate https://t.co/Ts4F6kXuog

The #COVID19 pandemic has hit New Mexico's energy sector hard — and we've gotta get folks back to work.   I'm fighting for federal funding to plug orphaned wells and create good jobs for laid-off oil and gas workers. Learn more ⤵️   https://t.co/x3geXddXjO

We can bring an end to #COVID19 — but we need to listen to the experts and work together.  @MarkRonchettiNM's decision to ignore the science puts us all at risk. #nmpol #NMSenDebate https://t.co/pH29iw48Sj

When I was fighting to get #COVID19 relief for New Mexico families and small businesses @MarkRonchettiNM was spreading dangerous conspiracy theories about the virus.   This is a serious pandemic — and New Mexicans need serious leaders. #NMSenDebate #nmpol https://t.co/3b8DNt1EaT

My second debate starts in 10 min & I'm excited to share my positive vision for New Mexico with viewers across our state!   Tune in to @NMPBS to hear about my plans to improve health care create good jobs & rebuild from COVID-19. #NMSenDebate #nmpol ⬇️ https://t.co/COiqv4pZ7Z

When New Mexico's state and local governments struggled under the weight of COVID-19 I fought to secure millions in funding to get us on the path to recovery.  @MarkRonchettiNM opposed federal relief funding and said we didn't need a bailout. He's the wrong choice for NM. #nmpol

Instead of voting on a #COVID19 relief package to help working families Senate Republicans are holding the second day of hearings for a #SCOTUS nominee who would strip health care from 245000 New Mexicans.  That's wrong — and it's the opposite of what we need during a pandemic. https://t.co/8J8SBSHwIt

Congratulations to @Deb4CongressNM on a powerful debate performance tonight!  It's been a privilege to work w/Deb toward real progress on the issues that matter most—from #COVID19 relief to health care & job creation.  #ImwithDeb because she'll never stop fighting for New Mexico.

Tonight @KamalaHarris laid out the stakes.  In the middle of a pandemic @MarkRonchettiNM and President Trump would strip health care from millions & end protections for those w/#COVID19 & other pre-existing conditions.  Early voting is open. Go make your voice heard. #VPDebate

Horrified by President Trump's announcement that he's blocking #COVID19 relief until after the election?  @MarkRonchettiNM would go even farther — he doesn't think our struggling communities deserve help at all.  Take a look: https://t.co/6pMAVEWdkr

Tonight New Mexico's choice was clear.  If you send @MarkRonchettiNM to the Senate he'll fight to privatize Medicare & block the funding we need to recover from #COVID19.  If you send me to the Senate I'll fight for you.  Pitch in to power our campaign: https://t.co/53KxoTldV3

When our energy sector was hit by #COVID19 I fought for federal funding to plug abandoned wells & create jobs for oil and gas workers.  New Mexicans deserve good jobs. I’ll always defend the ones we have & fight to create new opportunities for all.  https://t.co/2H4Eo5hqKB
.@MarkRonchettiNM said President Trump’s #COVID19 response has been “very good.”  That’s it. That’s the tweet. #nmpol #NMSenDebate https://t.co/0nqN89T16D

When #COVID19 hit New Mexico’s businesses I fought to help them keep their doors open.  I know that small businesses are the bedrock of our economy and I’ll keep working to help them recover and rebuild stronger than before. #nmpol #NMSenDebate  https://t.co/tCZwqevsqS

Over the last four months my opponent’s party has stonewalled every effort to pass common-sense #COVID19 relief and allowed federal unemployment to expire for millions. New Mexico deserves better. #nmpol #NMSenDebate

✅ High-quality affordable health care ✅ Rebuilding our economy from #COVID19   I'm excited to talk about my vision to move New Mexico forward during tonight's debate.  Read more about my plans ⤵️⤵️ and then tune into KOB tonight at 6 PM!  https://t.co/g8rjGkcNGF

When #COVID19 hit New Mexico's businesses hard I fought to get them the relief they needed.  I know that small businesses are the bedrock of our economy and I'll never stop fighting for them. #nmpol https://t.co/Pz0mUfHar6

TODAY AT 1 PM: Join me and representatives from the labor community for a discussion about the state of working people in New Mexico.  We’ll talk about fair wages strong unions and helping workers through the challenges presented by COVID-19. RSVP ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/NnVSi1O02U

✅ Recovering from COVID-19 ✅ Fighting climate change and wildfires ✅ Protecting health care and pre-existing conditions  Glad to join Richard Eeds to discuss the most important issues facing New Mexicans. Listen 🔊🔊: https://t.co/lq0xnNZzq4

During a pandemic we need leaders who will listen to facts and science. Instead @MarkRonchettiNM spread false information about #COVID19 and praised President Trump’s deadly mismanagement as “very good.”   New Mexicans are dying. Now is the time for serious leadership. #nmpol https://t.co/DRo6AiNVhh

With Congress voting on critical COVID relief my top priority is doing my job—securing the aid NM needs.  Given the news that the Congressional schedule remains in flux I look forward to at least 2 confirmed debates. If Congress wraps by 10/5 I'll be glad to join a 3rd on KOB. https://t.co/NrWXAKVgwV

As early as February President Trump knew that #COVID19 could present a deadly threat to millions of Americans.  Instead of warning us — or preparing the country to respond — he downplayed the virus to protect his approval ratings. Now 190000 Americans have died. https://t.co/KIJP4cMTd1

When an unprecedented global pandemic hit New Mexico's health care workers stepped up and made our state’s #COVID19 response a model for the nation.   Health care workers are heroes and I'll always have their backs. Watch: https://t.co/AYgsyDFCOg

✅ Getting New Mexico on the path to recovery from #COVID19  ✅ Ensuring high-quality affordable health care ✅ Supporting unions and working people ✅ Creating good jobs and a strong fair economy  New Mexico deserves a bright future. Read my plans:  https://t.co/KDFRQcNQSk

New Mexico's health care workers are the heroes of #COVID19 and they deserve leaders in the Senate who will fight for them.  That's why my new ad puts our health care heroes front and center. Watch and share: #nmpol https://t.co/MxymV9JdVV

📣 New Mexico's absentee ballot application portal is OPEN!  The safest way to cast your ballot during the #COVID19 pandemic is through the mail. Request your ballot now to ensure you receive it with enough time to return it before Election Day. ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/0Kb8CqKBPI (1/2)

Don’t miss our Educators for Ben Roundtable TONIGHT at 6:00 PM!  During this Roundtable I’ll discuss the status of education during COVID-19 with leaders from across NM.  Learn more about our panelists and then click the link below to register. https://t.co/rBfHyqdkDz! https://t.co/7U8difOkpQ

It's been 100 days since the House passed a #COVID19 relief package to help families stay afloat.  Instead of holding a vote on our bill Senate Republicans spent months stalling — and then went on vacation with no deal.  We need to flip the Senate. https://t.co/XJ6zIeAnNT

More than 30% of the Navajo Nation lacks running water an unacceptable reality that shows the government's failure to fulfill its obligations to Native communities.  Clean water is key to combat #COVID19. I'm demanding real action to bring running water to these communities now. https://t.co/RatZFtrLh5

.@Michelle4NM has led New Mexico with conviction and set a national example for strong leadership in the face of #COVID19.  If you didn’t catch her live at the #DemConvention check out the recap ⬇️⬇️ to watch her make New Mexico proud. https://t.co/ewyjPzXrep

For months Senate Republicans have refused to vote on the House relief bill to help families through #COVID19.  Now with millions on the verge of eviction the Senate GOP is going on vacation. This level of heartlessness and cruelty is reprehensible. https://t.co/DAWLdsbHOu

Out in the field wearing a mask keeps the dust out of your lungs.  During #COVID19 a mask keeps your family safe.  Here in New Mexico we know masks aren't political. They're just common sense. https://t.co/wu4NZN7xpk
In Southeastern New Mexico New Mexicans asked:   "What will you do to help New Mexico seniors  during COVID-19?" https://t.co/5Hs37nlYxd
In Sandoval County New Mexicans asked:   "What can the federal government do to support educators as we ponder the coming school year and COVID-19?" https://t.co/gdFYj9ouyk

New Mexico's school districts have worked hard to provide meals throughout #COVID19 & I'm grateful for their efforts.  But they can't do it alone. The #HEROESAct includes billions for child nutrition because keeping kids fed should always be a top priority https://t.co/fLFwANxdKA

The #COVID19 pandemic has shown us the dangers of a system where basic health care is out-of-reach.  Everyone deserves to be able to see a doctor easily when they get sick. It's that simple. https://t.co/KHHxMlEJkC

Last week the House voted to pass a bill that includes key victories I secured for NM including:  ✅ Prohibiting Southwest Chief service reductions ✅ $$ to train our workforce for jobs at the National Labs ✅ $$ to support unemployment programs strained during #COVID19 (1/3)

Mitch McConnell's plan to slash fed. unemployment insurance would be an act of cruelty against millions of Americans who have lost their jobs during #COVID19.  The Senate must pass the #HEROESAct & extend the $600/week payments now. NM families can't wait. https://t.co/ZnBSoNIJFK

Nearly 2 weeks ago I talked to voters in Guadalupe County about the urgent need to extend federal unemployment benefits and help NM families through #COVID19.  Instead the Senate GOP just let those benefits expire. That's why I'm running for Senate — because you deserve better. https://t.co/NRs6URuKSf

Small businesses are the bedrock of NM’s economy & I’m working every day to make sure they have the support they need from Congress.  My new ad “Lifeline” tells the story of how the PPP loans I fought for helped one of our most beloved restaurants stay running through #COVID19. https://t.co/xgKxndAkwS

The #CARESAct was an important 1st step against #COVID19 but many small communities & businesses didn't get the help they need.  That's why I wrote the Coronavirus Community Relief Act which would provide direct pandemic support to small communities. We're all in this together. https://t.co/JXexcJCzU8

For years I've been fighting for #downwinders to get the medical and financial compensation they deserve — and as #COVID19 takes a disproportionate toll on those with pre-existing health conditions the need for action has never been more urgent.  https://t.co/6lAkeRrkz5

NEW: Today my campaign is releasing our second ad “Lifeline.”  It’s a story about the small businesses that make New Mexico strong and the work I’ve done in Congress to keep them afloat through #COVID19. WATCH: https://t.co/dqYApdE2Zs

As kids rely on distance learning during #COVID19 expanding broadband is more urgent than ever.  I'm working across the aisle to improve internet access & make sure that every child has an equal chance to succeed — and with your help we can get it done. https://t.co/KmhrbiD3l2

10 weeks ago I fought to pass a House extension of fed. unemployment insurance for tens of millions of Americans out of work due to #COVID19.  Helping families through the pandemic should be top priority in the Senate. Instead Mitch McConnell is stonewalling our relief package.

After Congress passed a first round of funding to help Native American communities through #COVID19 the Trump administration kept that money from tribes and pueblos for nearly three months.  That's a violation of our trust obligations and it's just plain wrong. (1/2) https://t.co/8GTB9fpw9n

No one is invincible during this pandemic.  With young people making up a greater share of new #COVID19 cases it's more important than ever to wear a mask & social distance.  Making safe choices now will get us back to normal faster. Let's do it NM!  https://t.co/017gjOhqZZ

The right to vote is fundamental — and #COVID19 hasn't changed that.  I'm glad to see these much-needed changes to safeguard tribal voting rights but we must continue to be vigilant and make sure that every vote can be cast and counted. (1/2)   https://t.co/nvxZWKbvWY

Glad to join the the Albuquerque @TheIsmailiUSA community for a food drive today!  Since the beginning of COVID-19 New Mexicans have stepped up in incredible ways to support each other.  We will get through this pandemic like we've overcome every challenge before — together. https://t.co/TWvb76HsbP

These comments are racist and offensive.  Hispanics are disproportionately represented among the essential workers keeping our country going and are paying the price by suffering from #COVID19 at greater rates.  The President has failed to lead and the blame lies with him. https://t.co/RN5gQoHrvS
@NMCaregivers Passing the HEROES Act is an important step to help our communities recover from COVID-19. Thank you so much for your advocacy on this.

New Mexicans know the economic crisis caused by #COVID19 isn't over.   The #HEROESAct would extend federal unemployment benefits past July 31 and help families keep food on the table. This is common-sense relief — and it's time to pass it into law.   https://t.co/88imLPLDyc

Our government has a treaty — and moral — obligation to adequately fund the IHS & invest fairly in infrastructure for tribal communities.  Nothing less is acceptable — and as #COVID19 continues immediate action is more important than ever.  https://t.co/MwaIOYwBF9

Under my amendment to a bill passed last week National Labs could receive $6 billion to create good infrastructure jobs and improve facilities.  Our labs are at the forefront of innovation and the fight against #COVID19 and they deserve our full support. https://t.co/cKXV4zQAcn

Over the last four months New Mexicans have shown tremendous resilience in the face of COVID-19.  Today I wanted to share a few of the stories that show how our communities have come together to fight this pandemic. Take a read & share your own story. https://t.co/xRlaeAdae9

Durante la pandemia los trabajadores Latinos esenciales han sostenido nuestras comunidades.  Ahora los Latinos sufren desproporcionadamente de #COVID19 y dificultades económicas. Se necesita un alivio urgente comenzando con la aprobación de la Ley de los HÉROES. https://t.co/VpJXqG4mmY

Throughout the pandemic Latino essential workers have kept our communities afloat.  Now Latinos are suffering from disproportionate #COVID19 infection rates & economic hardship. Urgent relief is needed — starting with passing the #HEROESAct into law.  https://t.co/YY6YbS7Sol
ICYMI: Last week I hosted a health care roundtable to discuss #COVID19 with experts from across New Mexico's medical community. Watch: https://t.co/PQSLXLuJwA

The path to ending the #COVID19 epidemic begins with expanded testing treatment and contact tracing.  Instead President Trump has admitted to ordering a testing slowdown. This is deadly cowardice — and history will remember it as such.  https://t.co/6B2SRc8i0x

The drop in #COVID19 hospitalizations is good news but the pandemic still presents a deadly threat.  Please remember to practice social distancing wear a mask and avoid large gatherings. We will beat this disease by continuing to take it seriously.  https://t.co/JmJwHfjKfG

ICYMI: @ALDIANews highlighted my efforts to bring relief to tribal communities facing the devastating impact of #COVID19.  This pandemic has put a spotlight on the dangerous disparities that our Indigenous brothers and sisters face. We need progress — now. https://t.co/jrOjJOovTL
Across New Mexico #COVID19 testing centers are open and free even if you don't have insurance.  Learn more and find a testing site near you: https://t.co/yhQn1d9L53

WATCH: Tonight at 6:30 PM my campaign is hosting a health care roundtable with members of Health Care Workers for Ben.   Tune in to join our discussion about #COVID19 and how to improve health care across the spectrum for all New Mexicans. https://t.co/5GNhw8KKRX

Before #COVID19 I was working to expand health care and reduce the disparities that make high-quality care more difficult to access for people of color.  Now that work has only become more urgent. Expanding health care is not a should but a must.  https://t.co/YjQMkGDtZk

NM is making big strides against #COVID19 but too many frontline workers are still falling ill.  For nearly a month the House-passed #HEROESAct has been stalling on Mitch McConnell's desk keeping our health care workers from getting more PPE. There's no excuse for this delay. https://t.co/kRLMXJFCqQ

I'm running to build a brighter future for New Mexico starting with better health care a stronger economy and a quick recovery from #COVID19.   This campaign is about all of us — and I hope to earn your trust and your vote. https://t.co/cA1yKbMUGk

Today is my birthday — and as we move closer to flattening the curve I'm asking for contributions to support the Native American Relief Fund which provides emergency #COVID19 response assistance to Indigenous communities across NM.  Pitch in below ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/B1m0VaHHhp

Coronavirus has hit our communities hard. As your senator I will fight every day to bring the resources you and your neighbors need to recover.  That's the promise I made on-air to @KOB4 — and it's the promise I'm proud to make to you https://t.co/zxrZMCNVXV

When #COVID19 disrupted the school year New Mexico’s educators sprung into action to keep kids learning.  Educators are heroes. Today I'm proud to launch Educators for Ben a new group of leaders who support our campaign. See their stories & share yours: https://t.co/G2sQPVxl1K
Glad to have the opportunity to share my vision for New Mexico's future and our recovery from COVID-19 with @thenewmexican. Check it out ⤵️⤵️  https://t.co/LGsfYpiUCQ

In New Mexico we understand the difference between fast internet slow internet & no internet.   I'm pushing Congress to pass an unprecedented broadband expansion to help rural areas connect. #COVID19 has highlighted the unacceptable digital divide — and we need real solutions. https://t.co/CaTEUdmQOV

New Mexico's Native communities are suffering from a disproportionate #COVID19 infection rate with existing health disparities worsening the impact.  If you can please contribute to the Native American Relief Fund to help flatten the curve: https://t.co/B1m0VaHHhp

As the Navajo Nation struggles with one of the worst #COVID19 outbreaks the Trump administration's decision to put cronyism over public health may have put lives at risk.  This is unacceptable — and I won't rest until those in charge are held accountable. https://t.co/tTYpCzXV79

President Trump's unproven assertions that hydroxychloroquine is a safe treatment for #COVID19 were dangerous & irresponsible.  How many lives will be lost because the President refuses to listen to medical experts about the best ways to protect our communities from this crisis? https://t.co/OnxvEULXuD

Overall our absentee ballot system is working and vote-by-mail remains the safest option for voters during the COVID-19 pandemic. But as more and more New Mexicans request absentee ballots they must be sure  their votes will be counted. (2/2)

A bookstore owner & USAF veteran.  A Knight of Columbus & world traveler.  A son who spent his final weeks caring for his father who also passed from COVID-19.  New Mexico has lost more than 300 lives to #COVID19. We mourn their losses — and fight this virus in their memory. https://t.co/b8nDi5kIl8

With 11 days experience a former Trump staffer won a federal contract to supply masks to the Navajo Nation. Now @propublica is reporting his masks may be unsuitable for #COVID19.  Our government has failed Native families too many times. We must get to the bottom of this. https://t.co/4v1S82OQqW
Our communities will recover faster from COVID-19 thanks to the kindness of those donating their time and efforts to communities in need. Thank you!

Since March tens of thousands of National Guard members have deployed across the US to help w/ #COVID19 response.   Yesterday I urged the Trump administration not to nickel-and-dime these heroes by ending their activations just short of the qualifying period for benefits. (1/3) https://t.co/M364MFxv2m

✅400000+ union jobs ✅Service to every postal address in the US  ✅A connection to the outside world for millions  COVID-19 has shown how important the Post Office is to New Mexicans. I won't let Republicans win their misguided war on USPS. #SaveUSPS  https://t.co/h9TssiJAqW

Expanding #COVID19 testing and tracing is key to safely reopening our economy.  As part of the #CARESAct we secured more than $77 million to increase New Mexico's virus tracing programs. Our state has been a national leader in this fight & we're going to beat COVID-19 together. https://t.co/3B07dC4h90

La gente de nuestras comunidades sufren desproporcionadamente por el COVID 19.  Necesitamos atención médica que sea culturalmente competente y que funcione para comunidades diversas. Aplanar la curva significa mantener a todos saludables.  https://t.co/otlOChuc4p

People of color are suffering disproportionately from #COVID19 — & ending these disparities starts with acknowledging them.  We need culturally competent health care that works for diverse communities. Flattening the curve means keeping everyone healthy. https://t.co/1ESNqO33S5

At a time when Dr. Bright’s team should have been focused on life-saving #COVID19 vaccines and treatments political pressure from the White House distracted from their mission and sent them on a wild goose chase to prove hydroxychloroquine's efficacy against #COVID19. (6/8)

Dr. Bright testified that his superiors pushed him to make hydroxychloroquine widely available even without proof that the drug was safe or effective for #COVID19 treatment. (5/8)  https://t.co/4BPuzvxGTi
I asked Dr. Bright if President Trump spoke accurately when he said that hydroxychloroquine was a safe treatment for #COVID19.   Dr. Bright said no. (4/8)

When President Trump began promoting hydroxychloroquine in March scientific experts agreed that the drug needed more testing before it was recommended as a treatment for #COVID19. (2/8)  https://t.co/dLlIZxhbVI

For weeks President Trump has promoted the unproven use of hydroxychloroquine to treat #COVID19.  On Thursday I questioned Dr. Rick Bright a former public health official. His shocking testimony revealed how the President's obsession w/hydroxychloroquine put us at risk. (1/8)
ICYMI: COVID-19 testing is now open for all New Mexico workers.  Find a testing location near you: https://t.co/LChU5AxyRQ

New Mexico's health centers have fought tirelessly to respond to COVID-19 & we're deeply grateful for their work.  I'm proud to have been part of efforts to secure more than $6 million for COVID-19 relief & testing at our local health centers. Learn more: https://t.co/HZB6dvx9Xy

The #COVID19 crisis has highlighted the unsafe working conditions that too many Americans face.  Our work isn't done until everyone is safe healthy and respected in the workplace. Nothing less is acceptable.  https://t.co/STsMmGdJY7

Great news: New Mexico will soon receive a shipment of Remdesivir a drug that could aid COVID-19 treatment.  For weeks I've been working closely with @Deb4CongressNM & @TeamHeinrich to secure Remdesivir. COVID-19 patients deserve anything we can do to speed up their recovery. https://t.co/bDjegCkRV2

Price gouging during a pandemic is an act of cruelty against our communities — and it's illegal.  I'm working to strengthen protections against price gouging during COVID-19 & ensure that families can get what they need at fair prices. Learn more:  https://t.co/LKjlrt3Wbo

Don't forget to tune in to @Koat7News at 3:00 PM to watch last year's 🔥🔥🔥@NewMexicoUTD Cinco de Mayo match!  Our team may be sidelined because of #COVID19 but we can still celebrate last year's winning season from home. #SomosUnidos #WeAreUnited https://t.co/ibThNbFhKt

Do you have a story about how your community is responding to #COVID19?  My campaign is collecting stories about New Mexican resilience in the face of this pandemic and I want to hear from you. Share your story: https://t.co/rgRecGmgJL

New Mexicans are making a difference in the fight against #COVID19 at home and across the country!  Thank you to brave frontline workers like Brittany. You make all of us proud! #NMTrue  https://t.co/3OfngUnLXZ

The #COVID19 crisis has illustrated the urgent need to connect everyone to high-quality internet.  Last week I joined 11 House Dems to release a plan to invest $80 billion into broadband expansion in rural areas tribal communities & other areas in need. https://t.co/ADL6KYUwZH

Happy #NationalNursesDay!  Across New Mexico thousands of nurses are working long hours to treat COVID-19 patients and keep our communities healthy. You deserve our admiration and recognition today — and every day! #ThankYouNurses https://t.co/H5v3OLi7x5

New Mexico's small communities have mobilized to stop #COVID19 and I won't let Washington leave them behind.  I'm working to secure $250 billion for local governments on the front lines of this pandemic. We're all in this together.  https://t.co/TnUroRhxeI

Happy #NationalTeachersDay!  New Mexico's educators are superheroes building a bright future for our state one student at a time.  I'm especially grateful for all the ways educators have stepped up to keep students learning during #COVID19. Please join me & #ThankATeacher today. https://t.co/1vjMjEuj0r

REMINDER: Absentee ballot applications are due by Thursday May 28.  Voting by mail is the safest way to make your voice heard during the COVID-19 epidemic and every registered voter is eligible to request a ballot.  Learn more ⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/0Kb8CqKBPI

Amidst the hardship and loss caused by COVID-19 New Mexicans are showing the strength and resolve that will bring us out of this crisis.  I'm fighting in Congress to make sure families like Hannah's have the support they need and I'm grateful to all who are making a difference. https://t.co/ujoOXXIb6A

COVID-19 has disproportionately affected Native communities exacerbating health disparities & causing profound suffering.   I fought to help secure $8 billion in COVID-19 relief aid & I expect the Treasury to send that aid now. These unacceptable delays are costing lives. https://t.co/hremgKWqTN
How is your community responding to COVID-19?  Our campaign is collecting stories about resilience and unity during the COVID-19 epidemic. Share your story: https://t.co/rgRecGmgJL

Across New Mexico thousands of essential workers are on the front lines of this epidemic working long hours to keep their neighbors safe healthy and supplied.  You are the true heroes of COVID-19. Thank you.   https://t.co/6s54RrS9y5

COVID-19 has changed our way of life & brought unprecedented challenges to every community.  But in the face of this pandemic New Mexicans have responded with the strength grace & resilience that defines us.  Ahéhee’ gracias & thank you. We will flatten this curve together. https://t.co/CxegVAba25

Giving corporations a blanket license to pollute during the COVID-19 pandemic is unthinkable.  During my time in the House I've fought to protect our clean air and safeguard our public lands — and I'll keep fighting in the Senate.  https://t.co/s6CQXJ4Grz

People for Ben texting team volunteers are working hard to raise money for @RoadrunnerFdBnk!  Throughout the COVID-19 crisis Roadrunner has provided thousands of meals to needy families across New Mexico.   Join our texting team and make a difference: ➡️https://t.co/PLmy0HUhFL https://t.co/6OjqvGRTKi
